heading: Hotfix 2, August 9th & Born of the Stars Bundle!
content: Blizzard just rolled another Hotfix for Diablo 4 Patch 1.5 on August 9th! Let's discover together this Season 5 Hotfix 2 for Diablo 4. The Diablo 4 store recently got a new addition: which mainly includes the Celestial Steed Mount from World of Warcraft, a fan-favorite! We hope you enjoy the Season of the Infernal Hordes with the aid of our Season 5 compendium update. The is always monitoring Diablo 4 and the Season 5 metagame and changes to bring you the most updated content and build guides. Our focus for the start of Season 5 is to make sure our are solid with all the new Item updates and crafting changes. We're continuing to work on more updates for With that said, head over to our to stay up to date with our content development and to make the most of your Season 5 experience! Also don't forget to check out our Written by:
